exercises.question: Match the feeling to the object.
Select the furniture.
exercises.example_sentence: The apple is on the table.

exercises.example_sentence: The flowers are in the garden.

exercises.question: Match the size to the object.
exercises.example_sentence: The bird is small, the tree is big.

exercises.question: The ___ flies in the sky.
exercises.example_sentence: The bird flies in the sky.

exercises.question: Match the action to the item.

This plant has a trunk.
exercises.example_sentence: The bird is in the tree.

exercises.question: Match the color to the object.

exercises.hint: White and fluffy in the sky

exercises.question: We watch TV in the ___.
exercises.example_sentence: We sit in the living room.

exercises.question: Match the furniture to the action.
Match the room to the action.

exercises.example_sentence: The apple is on the table.

exercises.question: Match the size to the object.
I drink milk from a ___.
exercises.example_sentence: Give me a cup of milk.

exercises.question: I ___ a book.
exercises.example_sentence: I read a book every day.

exercises.example_sentence: Read a book and write with a pen.

exercises.question: Say 'teacher'.
exercises.example_sentence: The teacher is in the classroom.

exercises.hint: Someone you like and play with

I write on ___.
exercises.example_sentence: Give me a piece of paper.

exercises.question: Match the tool to the action.

exercises.example_sentence: The cat is under the table.

exercises.example_sentence: I wash my face in the morning.

exercises.example_sentence: I smile when I am happy.

exercises.example_sentence: I go to sleep at night.

exercises.example_sentence: The apple is on the table.

exercises.question: I want to sleep. I am ___.
Match the adjective to the noun.

exercises.example_sentence: My mom is in the kitchen.

exercises.question: Match the animal to where it lives.
Say 'animal'.
exercises.example_sentence: A lion is a large animal.

exercises.question: Match the animal to the size.
A dog wags its ___.
exercises.example_sentence: The dog has a long tail.

exercises.question: The ___ says 'quack'.
exercises.example_sentence: The duck is in the lake.

exercises.question: Match the product to the animal.
Match the action to the animal.
A cat or a dog is a ___.
exercises.hint: Animal that lives in a house

exercises.question: Match the body part to the action.

Order the sentence.
exercises.example_sentence: My leg is hurt from running.

exercises.question: Match the end part to the long part.
exercises.example_sentence: My hand is at the end of my arm.

exercises.question: The sick man is at the ___.
Order the sentence.
exercises.example_sentence: I wash my hands with soap.

exercises.question: It is nine ___.

exercises.question: Match the time of day to the tag.

exercises.example_sentence: The sun is out during the day.

exercises.question: Match the time unit to the length.
Seven days make one ___.
exercises.example_sentence: There are seven days in a week.

exercises.question: A ___ flies a plane.
exercises.example_sentence: The pilot is in the plane.

exercises.question: Match the job to the action or place.

Match the vehicle to where it travels.
exercises.example_sentence: A boat is on the water.

exercises.question: Match the speed to the object.

exercises.example_sentence: I go to work at 8 AM.

exercises.question: Paris is a big ___.
exercises.example_sentence: I live in a big city.
